languages.text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2% for each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and for each enemy they killed until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: The wearer's damage is increased by +2% for each critical hit and for each enemy they killed until the end of combat.
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2% for each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and for each enemy they killed until the end of combat.

languages.text: 每当装备者造成暴击或击杀敌人时，装备者造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高2%，效果持续至战斗结束。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2% for each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and for each enemy they killed until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者造成暴击或击杀敌人时，装备者造成的所有伤害都会提高2%，效果持续至战斗结束。{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}

languages.text: Наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 2% за каждое совершенное критическое {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} и каждого убитого врага до конца боя.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2% for each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and for each enemy they killed until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Наносимый урон увеличивается на 2% за каждое совершенное критическое попадание и каждого убитого врага до конца боя.
Наносимый урон увеличивается на 2% за каждое совершенное критическое попадание и каждого убитого врага до конца боя.

languages.text: 戦闘終了時まで、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}と、キルした敵それぞれに使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が2%増える。
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2% for each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and for each enemy they killed until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了時まで、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}と、キルした敵それぞれに使用者のダメージが2％増える。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} del portador aumenta +2 % por cada {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico y por cada enemigo que elimine hasta finalizar el combate.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2% for each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and for each enemy they killed until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: El daño del portador aumenta +2 % por cada {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico y por cada enemigo que elimine hasta finalizar el combate.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} des Trägers erhöht sich für jeden kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} und für jeden bis zum Ende des Kampfes von ihm getöteten Feind um +2 %.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2% for each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and for each enemy they killed until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Der Schaden des Trägers erhöht sich für jeden kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} und für jeden bis zum Ende des Kampfes von ihm getöteten Feind um +2 %.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de l'utilisateur augmentent de +2 % par {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique et par ennemi éliminé jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2% for each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and for each enemy they killed until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Les dégâts de l'utilisateur augmentent de +2 % par {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique et par ennemi éliminé jusqu'à la fin du combat.
